content: The Flint Vanguard's Spirit allows you to take the form of the rocky beast and beat your great fists into the ground, inflicting Scorch Bane and dealing Burn Damage to any enemies caught in the blasts. The equipped effect increases Scorch Damage and Burn Resistance, making it a great Spirit to channel while exploring the Flaming Mountains.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Vanguard Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Flint Vanguard's Spirit allows you to take the form of the rocky beast and beat your great fists into the ground, inflicting Scorch Bane and dealing Burn Damage to any enemies caught in the blasts. The equipped effect increases Scorch Damage and Burn Resistance, making it a great Spirit to channel while exploring the Flaming Mountains.
